rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {APG4001, APG4021, APG5001, APG5021, ATS1001, ATS1021, ATS2001, ATS2021}

description: This unit provides an introduction to written modern standard Chinese to students with a background in spoken Chinese. It provides training in formal grammatical structures and vocabulary to accelerate the development of students' literacy. An oral component is also included. This unit provides students with a basic critical understanding of Chinese society, its values and their evolutions.
